title: Internet of Things (IoT) Cognitive Technology and Information Management System Design

context.prior_knowledge: Network fundamentals, data processing concepts, and introductory programming skills
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment emphasizing practical application through agricultural IoT case studies

learning_goals: Learners can explain context-aware methodologies for analyzing uncertain cognitive information in IoT environments.
Learners can design intelligent routing maintenance and fault-response strategies using agricultural IoT systems as a case study.
Learners can conduct a prototype development project for an intelligent information management system linked to automated livestock management.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
